languages.text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
Выпускает 5 залпов торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямом попадании{/g} и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g}, лучше {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} и больше возможностей для {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонения{/g}, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Fires 5 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
Feuert 5 Salven Torpedos mit Plasma-Gefechtsköpfen mit kurzer Brenndauer ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direkten Treffer{/g} 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Verfehlt er sein Ziel, verursacht er in einem Bereich von 1 Feld 13 Schaden, da er per Annäherungszünder detoniert.
Torpedos mit kurzer Brenndauer haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, einen höheren {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert und eine bessere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}, aber eine kürzere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Feuert 5 Salven Torpedos mit Plasma-Gefechtsköpfen mit{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}kurzer Brenndauer{/g} ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem direkten Treffer 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Verfehlt er sein Ziel, verursacht er in einem Bereich von 1 Feld 13 Schaden, da er per {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} detoniert.
Torpedos mit kurzer Brenndauer haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, einen höheren {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen-{/g}Wert und eine bessere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}, aber eine kürzere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>

languages.text:
Tire 5 salves de torpilles à combustion rapide équipées d'ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 19 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}coup direct{/g}. Si elle manque sa cible, elle inflige 13 points de dégâts dans un rayon de 1 case en explosant sur une fusée de proximité.
Les torpilles à combustion rapide sont plus performantes en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}, mais leur durée de vie est plus courte.
<indent=5%>Rechargement : 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Tire 5 salves de torpilles à {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}combustion rapide{/g} équipées d'ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 19 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}coup direct{/g}. Si elle manque sa cible, elle inflige 13 points de dégâts dans un rayon de 1 case en explosant sur une {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.
Les torpilles à combustion rapide sont plus performantes en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}, mais leur durée de vie est plus courte.
<indent=5%>Rechargement : 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
发射5枚配备等离子弹头的短引信鱼雷。每枚鱼雷{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直接命中{/g}目标时会造成19点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆近炸引信，在1格范围内造成13点伤害。
短引信鱼雷拥有更高的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}，但时效较短。
<indent=5%>装填时间：一轮</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
发射5枚配备等离子弹头的{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短引信{/g}鱼雷。每枚鱼雷{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直接命中{/g}目标时会造成19点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成13点伤害。
短引信鱼雷拥有更高的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}，但时效较短。
<indent=5%>装填时间：一轮</indent>

languages.text:
Dispara salvas de 5 torpedos de carga corta con ojivas de plasma. Cada torpedo inflige 19 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto directo{/g} y 13 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un detonador de proximidad.
Los torpedos de carga corta tienen mejor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}, pero su duración es más baja.
<indent=5%>Recarga: 1 asalto</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Dispara salvas de 5 torpedos de {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}carga corta{/g} con ojivas de plasma. Cada torpedo inflige 19 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto directo{/g} y 13 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}.
Los torpedos de carga corta tienen mejor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}, pero su duración es más baja.
<indent=5%>Recarga: 1 asalto</indent>

languages.text:
プラズマ弾頭を搭載した短燃焼魚雷を5発発射する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直撃{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に19{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は近接信管で1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
短燃焼魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>リロード：1ラウンド</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
プラズマ弾頭を搭載した{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短燃焼{/g}魚雷を5発発射する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直撃{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に19{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}近接信管{/g}で1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
短燃焼魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>リロード：1ラウンド</indent>

У торпед ускоренного цикла выше {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g}, лучше {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} и больше возможностей для {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонения{/g}, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
Plazma savaş başlıklarıyla donatılmış 5 hızlı yanan torpido salvosu ateşler. Her bir torpido, {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}doğrudan vuruşta{/g} 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g}; ıskalayıp da yakınlık fünyesi ile patlatıldığı takdirde ise 1 hücrelik yarıçapta 13 hasar verir.
Hızlı yanan torpidolar daha yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hız{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyetine{/g} sahip olsalar da daha kısa ömürlüdürler.
<indent=5%>Doldurma: 1 raunt</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell radius on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
